meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>ordinal number prefix</kanji> <kanji>two</kanji> <kanji>chapter</kanji> has a much simpler way of describing it, which is <vocabulary>chapter two</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
